page.title: 11Spare Time
page.content: Saturday - My brother woke me at seven to play marbles. We played seven games then we went down stairs to watch Wide Awake Club on television. After a breakfast of branflakes, I went out to use my BMX and played soccer. After lunch of a bacon sandwich, I watched the Cup Final, then my friends and I played ball tig and made some dens. I was so tired, I had salad for tea and went to bed. Sunday - I played football with Ian before my breakfast of shreddies. I was half asleep and spilt my milk everywhere. We played on a ramp on the field and kicked balls at each other until lunch, which was cinnamon toast. I met Miles. We went back to the field. Halfway through our game of football, Miles was pulled off his bike by a bully but we escaped. It was 8 p.m. so I went to bed.
